attributes.action: Give Robert Chilowa a place to live, citizenship and an perhaps even knighthood.
attributes.additional_details: What sort of people do we want living in this country. Non-doms and Russian criminals/billionaires how contribute nothing or heroes?
attributes.background: Robert Chilowa from Zimbabwe saved two children from a house fire in Manchester. He's now told by some outsourcing deportation outfit that he must leave hist accommodation in 12 days and hence effectively the country - as he has been disallowed from finding new accommodation.
